alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 25 at 11:19AM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of west central South Dakota, including the following county, Pennington. * WHEN...Until 645 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1113 AM MDT, Runoff from heavy rainfall over Rapid City Sunday night, has caused minor flooding along Rapid Creek from just east of Caputa to the Cheyenne River. - Additional rainfall is possible today across the area. - Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Farmingdale.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads.
